data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Selangor, Malaysia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Selangor, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 190,394 believers in Selangor to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 5,220,905 lost friends and neighbors.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 28 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Selangor, Malaysia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Selangor to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Malay people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Malay people.
Spirit, please defend the 190,394 believers in Selangor against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Selangor, Malaysia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Selangor that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
